/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
@[simp]
theorem norm_eq (h : f 0 = 0) : «expr‖ ‖» f = «expr‖ ‖» f.cont_linear :=
  calc
    «expr‖ ‖» f = max («expr‖ ‖» (f 0)) («expr‖ ‖» f.cont_linear) := by rw [norm_def]
    _ = max 0 («expr‖ ‖» f.cont_linear) := by rw [h, norm_zero]
    _ = «expr‖ ‖» f.cont_linear := max_eq_right (norm_nonneg _)
    
#align norm_eq norm_eq

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem norm_comp_le (g : «expr →A[ ] » W₂ 𝕜 V) : «expr‖ ‖» (f.comp g) ≤ «expr‖ ‖» f * «expr‖ ‖» g + «expr‖ ‖» (f 0) :=
  by
  rw [norm_def, max_le_iff]
  constructor
  ·
    calc
      «expr‖ ‖» (f.comp g 0) = «expr‖ ‖» (f (g 0)) := by simp
      _ = «expr‖ ‖» (f.cont_linear (g 0) + f 0) := by
        rw [f.decomp]
        simp
      _ ≤ «expr‖ ‖» f.cont_linear * «expr‖ ‖» (g 0) + «expr‖ ‖» (f 0) :=
        ((norm_add_le _ _).trans (add_le_add_right (f.cont_linear.le_op_norm _) _))
      _ ≤ «expr‖ ‖» f * «expr‖ ‖» g + «expr‖ ‖» (f 0) :=
        add_le_add_right (mul_le_mul f.norm_cont_linear_le g.norm_image_zero_le (norm_nonneg _) (norm_nonneg _)) _
      
  ·
    calc
      «expr‖ ‖» (f.comp g).cont_linear ≤ «expr‖ ‖» f.cont_linear * «expr‖ ‖» g.cont_linear :=
        (g.comp_cont_linear f).symm ▸ f.cont_linear.op_norm_comp_le _
      _ ≤ «expr‖ ‖» f * «expr‖ ‖» g :=
        (mul_le_mul f.norm_cont_linear_le g.norm_cont_linear_le (norm_nonneg _) (norm_nonneg _))
      _ ≤ «expr‖ ‖» f * «expr‖ ‖» g + «expr‖ ‖» (f 0) :=
        by
        rw [le_add_iff_nonneg_right]
        apply norm_nonneg
      
#align norm_comp_le norm_comp_le

theorem decomp (f : «expr →A[ ] » V R W) : (f : V → W) = f.cont_linear + Function.const V (f 0) :=

  rcases f with ⟨f, h⟩
  rw [coe_mk_const_linear_eq_linear, coe_mk, f.decomp, Pi.add_apply, LinearMap.map_zero, zero_add]
#align decomp decomp
cont_linear_map_vsub:

theorem cont_linear_map_vsub (f : «expr →A[ ] » P R Q) (p₁ p₂ : P) :
    f.cont_linear («expr -ᵥ » p₁ p₂) = «expr -ᵥ » (f p₁) (f p₂) :=
  f.to_affine_map.linear_map_vsub p₁ p₂

cont_linear_eq_zero_iff_exists_const:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ᵃ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ᵃ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ᵃ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →A[ ] » -/
theorem cont_linear_eq_zero_iff_exists_const (f : «expr →A[ ] » P R Q) : f.cont_linear = 0 ↔ ∃ q, f = const R P q :=
  by
  have h₁ : f.cont_linear = 0 ↔ (f : «expr →ᵃ[ ] » P R Q).linear = 0 :=
    by
    refine' ⟨fun h => _, fun h => _⟩ <;> ext
    · rw [← coe_cont_linear_eq_linear, h]
      rfl
    · rw [← coe_linear_eq_coe_cont_linear, h]
      rfl
  have h₂ : ∀ q : Q, f = const R P q ↔ (f : «expr →ᵃ[ ] » P R Q) = AffineMap.const R P q :=
    by
    intro q
    refine' ⟨fun h => _, fun h => _⟩ <;> ext
    · rw [h]
      rfl
    · rw [← coe_to_affine_map, h]
      rfl
  simp_rw [h₁, h₂]
  exact (f : «expr →ᵃ[ ] » P R Q).linear_eq_zero_iff_exists_const
#align cont_linear_eq_zero_iff_exists_const cont_linear_eq_zero_iff_exists_const
